Summary

Narrative

Welcome to House 13,

I’d like to tell you a little about us,

Rumors say that we feast on fear and then suddenly disappear, 

Leaving you all alone

But let me tell you, that’s not true,

You’ll constantly feel us around you

Use tactics and luck to walk out that door

If not, prepare to be locked in here forevermore

Now tell me, do you dare to enter?

How To Play

Objective: The objective is to complete and discard all sets in your hand, and avoid the ‘Devil’ card. Each turn, the player draws a card from the person before them and proceeds to: a) make and discard a set or b) roll a dice. Rolling the dice changes your hands, with the chance of acquiring or getting rid of the Devil card.

Every time players make a set, they must add points respective to that set in the counter.

The turn passes and players continue till there are only 2 players left, of which the player with the devil card loses.

Players can also win by scoring 7 points, after which their unfinished sets are turned into a deck of cards.
